com.bmc.arsys.apitransport.connection

Class ApiProxyManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bmc.arsys.apitransport.connection.ApiProxyManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ApiProxyManagerI
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ApiDefaultProxyAbstractManager, ProxyManager

    public abstract class ApiProxyManager
extends Object
implements ApiProxyManagerI
    This proxy manager has the ability to age-out pooled proxy and pools based on settings. It also allow clients to dynamically adjust those settings on the fly.

        public void clear()
        Clear the pool for each server whose connections (proxies) are managed by this ProxyManager. Connections will be terminated.
        Specified by:

      • getConnectionLifespan

        public static long getConnectionLifespan(ARTimeUnit unit)
        Check if load is set to be balanced. If yes, return the connectionLifespan setting in milliseconds for connections needs to be terminated since it established, If no, return 0;
        Returns:
